preference.name: TC_fts_shared_tmp_dir_autonomy_path
preference.preference_description:
Specifies the temporary exchange directory path for the machine where the Autonomy server is running. This preference is defined in a new installation but has no default value and no instance created. Valid Values: A valid value can be a UNC path or a local path, using forward slash / as a separator, such as //myserver/shared, F:/shared, and /tmp.
The user account used to start the Autonomy server must have write privileges to this directory. A value specified in this preference overrides values defined by the TC_fts_shared_tmp_dir_wnt and TC_fts_shared_tmp_dir_unix preferences.
